full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @036A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS 'JAM DPAL YE SHES @036B SEMS DPA'I DON DAM PA'I MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA, BCOM LDAN 'DAS DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SH'AKYA THUB PAS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO,, ,,'DI LO CHEN RIN CHEN BZANG PO'I 'GYUR LA SHONG BLO GROS BRTAN PAS BCOS PA LA DON DANG MI 'GAL ZHING GRAGS CHED RNAMS, LO CHEN 'GYUR NYID GZHIR BZHAG ,'GYUR GNYIS KA LA MI @037A *, ,BCOS SU MI RUNG BA RNAMS DAG PAR RGYA GAR GYI DPE DANG, RGYA 'GREL CHEN MO RNAMS DANG MTHUN PAR ZHA LU LO TZTSA BA DHARMA P'A LA BHADRA ZHES BGYI BAS LHUN PO SGANG DU 'JAM SDUD BZANG GSUM GTZO BOR GYUR BA'I MDO PHRAN GRAGS CHE BA KHUNGS MA RAGS RIM ZHIG PAR DU SGRUB DUS SHUS CHEN LEGS PAR BGYIS SO, ,@037B AOm SVASTI, SKYON GYIS MA GOS SKU MDOG DKAR, ,RDZOGS SANGS RGYAS KYIS DBU LA BRGYAN, ,THUGS RJE'I SPYAN GYIS 'GRO LA GZIGS, ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS LA PHYAG 'TSAL LO, ,AOm MA nI PADME H'Um ,PO tA LA YI RTZE MO NAS, MGON MAD 'GRO LA RTAG TU GZIGS, ,DKON MCHOG RIN CHEN GSUM GYI DNGOS, ,@038A *, ,'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS LA 'DUD, ,AOm MA nI PADME H'Um3, CHOS KYI SNYING PO YI GE DRUG ,'GRO DRUG 'DREN PA'I DED DPON STE, ,ZAB MO SNGAGS KYI NUS MTHU YIS, ,BU YI RGYUD LA BYIN GYIS BRLOBS, ,AOm MA nI PADME H'Um3, BYANG CHUB SEMS MCHOG RIN PO CHE, ,MA SKYE BA RNAMS SKYES GYUR @038B CIG ,SKYES PA NYAMS PA MED PAR YANG, ,GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL BAR SHOG ,AOm MA nI PADME H'Um3, 'DI NAS SHI 'PHOS GYUR MA THAG ,BAR DO'I 'KHRUL SNANG MI 'BYUNG BAR , ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG ZHAL BSTAN STE, ,BDE BA CAN DU 'KHRID PAR SHOG ,AOm MAnI PADME H'Um3, ,(ZHES PA 'DI YANG 'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYIS DNGOS SU RJES SU @039A *, ,BZUNG BA'I DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BYIN RLABS CAN SHA STAG BTUS TE BTZUN GZUGS NGAG GI DBANG POS BSGRIGS 'DIS KYANG 'BREL LDAN YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,, `'JAM SDUD BZANG GSUM GYI PAR 'DI KUN DGA' CHOS GLING GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS, ,)
